definition: the use of tricks to deceive someone (usually to extract money from them)
details:
noun
- the use of tricks to deceive someone (usually to extract money from them)
= synonyms: shenanigan
- verbal misrepresentation intended to take advantage of you in some way
= synonyms: slickness, hocus-pocus, hanky panky, jiggery-pokery, skulduggery, skullduggery
